content:
We are having some challenges with the CDC Sample data, it appears like we are only getting one population in each group.
@Gino Canessa
If you look at FHIR-102 you can see the issue, there's only an initial population, no other measures in the first group, and the same happens eslewhere.
@Keith Boone fixed - pushed to the servers and the PR on the fhir-saner repo.
